title: Handle a Pre-Scheduled Ride
description: A rider schedules a trip to the airport for the next day. The system must dispatch a driver at the appropriate time.

tasks.description: A rider books a trip for a future time and date.
tasks.expected_outcome: The scheduled ride is logged in the system.

tasks.description: Shortly before the scheduled pickup time, the system offers the trip to nearby drivers.
tasks.expected_outcome: The trip request is sent out to eligible drivers.

tasks.description: A driver accepts the scheduled trip.
tasks.expected_outcome: The trip is assigned to a specific driver.

tasks.description: The system instructs the driver to head towards the pickup location to arrive at the scheduled time.
tasks.expected_outcome: The driver is dispatched to ensure an on-time pickup.
